title: GST Rate Cut: Impact on CPI inflation, fiscal deficit and RBI policy
description: The Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council, at its 56th meeting, announced a major overhaul of the tax structure, effective 22 September 2026. The current four-tier system has been rationalised into a simplified two-tier framework of 5% and 18%, with a special de-merit rate of 40% for select goods and...

title: Elderly Poverty in Andorra: Navigating a Rapidly Aging Future
description: Elderly poverty in Andorra poses challenges, but also opens the door for innovation. By focusing on disease prevention, healthy aging and stronger social protections, the country can reduce health care costs while empowering seniors to stay active and valued. This can only be possible with strategic...
